doc:
Douglas Wood (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Douglas_Wood_(actor) 0 Douglas Wood (October 31, 1880 – January 13, 1966) was an American actor of stage and screen during the first six decades of the 20th century. Born on Halloween 1880 (October 31), his mother, Ida Jeffreys, was a stage actress. During the course of his career, Wood would appear in dozens of Broadway productions, and well over 100 films. Towards the end of his career, he would also make several guest appearances on television. Wood died in 1966. Douglas_Wood ( October_31 , 1880 – January_13_,_1966 ) was an_American_actor of stage_and_screen during the_first_six_decades of the_20th_century . Born on Halloween_1880 ( October_31_) , his_mother , Ida_Jeffreys , was a_stage_actress . During the_course of his_career , Wood would_appear in dozens of Broadway_productions , and well over 100_films . Towards the_end of his_career , he would_also_make several_guest_appearances on television . Wood died in 1966 .
